category.pattern: *I AM GOING ABROAD ON P710/ GCP/ ST GCP. CAN I STILL CONTINUE WITH THE AHEP PROGRAM? I MIGHT BE GOING ON GCP, CAN I STILL ENROLL?*
category.template:
To travel is to live; said somebody really wise.
Accenture Higher Education Program or AHEP is not for P710/GCP employees. If you think you will be getting into a GCP role soon, I'd say you should enjoy that experience now. And maybe enroll for the next batch of AHEP, what say.

Let me take a deep breath and take you through this!
The Accenture Higher Education Program or AHEP selection process begins when an email communication is sent out to eligible Techstars employees.(TechStar is a global recognition program for high performers, employees are nominated by entity business leadership for the programme.)
After that, selection to the AHEP is on a First Come First Served(FCFS) basis depending upon submission of the following documents to ahep@accenture.com via a single, consolidated email, with all educational documents named as firstname_lastname_item in JPEG format.
• Mark Sheets for all years of your Graduation.
• Final Graduation Certificate.
• Scanned copy of the consent form (Original to be handed over to the People Advisor)
• Employee Details to be filled in the spreadsheet attached in the slide deck.
• Supervisor / Skip level approval via email.
• Consent from employee to sign the Service Agreement.
You can always share your location preference once enrolled.
I am going to get some coffee now, how about you!
LRNDEV4

category.pattern: *WILL EMPLOYEE ATTENDING AHEP RECEIVE ANY SPECIAL CREDIT DURING PERFORMANCE ACHIEVEMENT, PROMOTIONS, INCREMENTS ETC.?*
category.template:
I am a creative genius and have the answer! The Accenture Higher Education Program or AHEP is a professional program to help employees who come from a technical background to enhance their managerial and leadership skills and capabilities while continuing to work within Accenture. So, the outcome or participation in AHEP will not have any bearing on the employee’s Talent outcome and/ or career progression. It's all about your personal growth, really.
LRNDEV5

category.pattern: *MINIMUM SERVICE AGREEMENT WITH ACCENTURE POST COMPLETION OF THE AHEP COURSE*
category.template:
Let me take care of this for you.
The Service Agreement mandates 12 months with Accenture after completion of the Accenture Higher Education Program (AHEP). After the Service Agreement, Accenture will reimburse the full amount of 25% paid by you initially to enroll for the course.
That’s a really good deal, if you ask me!

The trainings are designed to build your soft skills like basic spoken and written communication, communication styles, business communication, PowerPoint presentation etc. It will help you in your professional development and enhance your soft skills, required to enable you in your existing role and manage your team.

category.pattern: *CAN I SHARE THE INVITE FOR VIRTUAL TRAINING WITH MY COLLEGUES*
category.template:
There is no replacement process in Virtual sessions as there is no charge for not attending the session. However, the invite can be shared with other team members of the same Target Level. Also, there is no charge for No-Show in virtual sessions. Participant can cancel the registration from their end by raising a request with myL team: Contact Us
